# packages/adapter-rust/vendor/codelldb/darwin-x64/lldb/lib/python3.12/site-packages/pip/_vendor/rich/_log_render.py
@source-hash: d41c88d0f035669c
@generated: 2026-02-09T17:59:58Z

## Purpose
Renders structured log entries as formatted tables in the Rich console library, providing configurable display options for timestamps, levels, messages, and file paths.

## Core Classes

### LogRender (L14-86)
Main class responsible for formatting log entries into Rich Table objects. Configurable renderer that supports:
- Time display with optional deduplication
- Log level columns with fixed width
- File path display with optional line numbers and linking
- Message content with overflow handling

**Key Methods:**
- `__init__()` (L15-30): Configures display options including time format, level width, and visibility flags
- `__call__()` (L32-86): Main rendering method that transforms log data into a Table grid

**Configuration Properties:**
- `show_time`, `show_level`, `show_path`: Boolean flags controlling column visibility
- `time_format`: String format or callable for timestamp display (L20, L58-62)
- `omit_repeated_times`: Optimization to hide duplicate consecutive timestamps (L63-67)
- `level_width`: Fixed column width for log levels (L22, L51)

## Key Dependencies
- `rich.text.Text`: Core text rendering with styling
- `rich.table.Table`: Grid-based layout system (imported at L44)
- `rich.containers.Renderables`: Container for multiple renderable objects (L43, L71)
- `datetime`: Standard time handling

## Architectural Patterns

### Table Grid Layout (L46-54)
Uses Rich's Table.grid() for structured column layout:
- Time column with "log.time" style
- Level column with "log.level" style and fixed width
- Message column with ratio=1 and overflow="fold"
- Optional path column with "log.path" style

### Conditional Rendering (L48-83)
Dynamic table structure based on configuration flags, building row arrays incrementally.

### Time Deduplication (L63-67)
Caches last displayed time in `_last_time` to avoid visual repetition when `omit_repeated_times=True`.

### File Linking (L74-82)
Constructs clickable file links using Rich's link styling format: `link file://{path}#{line_no}`

## Type System
- `FormatTimeCallable` (L11): Type alias for custom time formatting functions
- Uses TYPE_CHECKING imports for circular dependency resolution (L7-9)
- Comprehensive type hints throughout for Console integration
